Cyzerg Referral Rewards

Send Cyzerg a Referral and We’ll Pay You Back! Literally.

We value your referrals, so we strive to show our gratitude by awarding our referral partners. That’s why we’re offering our Referral Rewards program here at Cyzerg. When you submit a qualified referral (using the form on this page) and it results in new business, we’ll send you a gift to show our appreciation. Do you know of a company in need of:

  • A dedicated, serious team of experienced IT professionals
  • Top-notch IT support
  • Expert, custom-built IT strategy

If your referral engages with Cyzerg on an hourly, project, or contract basis, we will happily reward you with one of the following:

 

One Qualified Lead
Your referral results in a meeting with the referred company		$100 Visa gift card
One Hour of Labor
Your referral results in at least 1 hour of work		$100 Visa gift card
One-Time Project
Your referral results in a one-time project		15% of the total project fee, excluding materials and parts (check or cash)
Monthly Contract
Your referral results in an annual contract		100% of the total fee for the first month’s work (check or cash)

Make a Referral

Complete the form below so we can show you our appreciation with a cash gift to you.
